ShortDescription: Ramco Systems Empowering Enterprise Growth With Innovative Products & Platforms
enhanced_description: Ramco is an innovative enterprise software provider, delivering multi-tenant cloud and mobile-based solutions designed to empower businesses and drive enterprise growth. Specializing in HR domains like Global Payroll, Talent Management, HR Management Suites, and Workforce Management, Ramco also extends its capabilities to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Logistics, and Maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul (MRO) for the Aviation industry. A key differentiator is its revolutionary enterprise application assembly and delivery platform, Ramco VirtualWorks, which enables the development of agile, real-time solutions. Unique features include Event-Driven Notifications, Frictionless Computing, and a Universal Personalization Engine (UPE), all aimed at helping enterprises connect with customers and partners in real-time and achieve specific business outcomes, such as building a more diverse and inclusive workforce.
integration_capabilities: Real-time connectivity with customers and partners
